field.name: startDateType
field.label: Earliest date
field.description: Display events on or after this day

field.name: startDateSpecify
field.label: Specify earliest date
field.description: Only needed if earliest date is 'Specify'

field.name: endDateType
field.label: Latest date
field.description: Display events on or before this day

field.name: endDateSpecify
field.label: Specify latest date
field.description: Only needed if latest date is 'Specify'

field.name: walkProgramme
field.label: Include walks from
field.description: Only include walks from a particular programme (other events are not affected)

field.name: walkProgrammeSpecify
field.label: Specify walks programme
field.query: SELECT SequenceID, Description FROM walksprogramme ORDER BY StartDate DESC

field.name: protocolReminders
field.label: Protocol reminders
field.description: One reminder on each line. These will be displayed between events.

field.name: diaryMode
field.label: Diary mode
field.description: Show events a user has attended

field.name: unpublished
field.label: Show unpublished events
field.description: Display unpublished events to users who are allowed to see them

field.name: showEditOptions
field.label: Show edit options
field.description: Allow users to add & edit events if their permissions allow
